text:
1 year ago on 2/14/18, 17 were killed in a senseless act of gun violence at Stoneman Douglas HS in Parkland.

html: This week was filled with many highlights -- including getting the keys to our new office in Cannon 431, where I hope to see and meet many of my constituents and supporters.pic.twitter.com/MWoGH94qOv

html: I’m privileged to now be in a position to be a voice for our community's values & give the people of our district the representation they deserve. I've heard from many of you & will always welcome everyone and their positions, even if they are different than mine.
text: I’m privileged to now be in a position to be a voice for our community's values & give the people of our district the representation they deserve. I've heard from many of you & will always welcome everyone and their positions, even if they are different than mine.

html: The road to this week was long and challenging, but also rewarding. I set out to represent #CA39 because I felt an obligation to serve my community and our country. It will continue to be my number one priority as your Representative.
